name: test_e2e_with_logs[037_SQLI_BYPASS_008]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_BYPASS_008` |
| **Name** | MySQL comment bypass variation |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | bypass_waf |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' /*!UNION*/ /*!SELECT*/ version(),NULL,NULL--`
- **Encoded**: `'%20%2F*!UNION*%2F%20%2F*!SELECT*%2F%20version()%2CNULL%2CNULL--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~27000ms
- **Timestamp**: 05:39:56.000 UTC
